amendment.description: To appropriate $8,000,000 for the Office of the Under Secretary for Information Analysis and Infrastructure Protection to conduct chemical facility security assessments.

action.text: Amendment SA 1350 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1350 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 297.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1350.

Amendment SA 1350 proposed by Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S99778, S9780, S9782-9783; text: CR S9778) To appropriate $8,000,000 for the Office of the Under Secretary for Information Analysis and Infrastructure Protection to conduct chemical facility security assessments.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1350 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 297.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1350 proposed by Senator Corzine.
